short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows live posts from http://www.010pixel.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension loads posts from http://www.010pixel.com and shows in the extension window. This way it helps to save time and opening tab for quick references from http://www.010pixel.com.
